entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Malay Falls 07:00 AM ADT Sunday 26 March 2023

Humidity: 82 %
Dewpoint: -3.8°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Snow or ice pellets. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this morning then changing to ice pellets this afternoon. Rain along parts of the coast this afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Rainfall amount 4 mm along parts of the coast. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 4 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Snow or rain ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 before morning. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Sunday 26 March 2023
